hints.content: He is a 'diamond in the rough'.
His best friend is a monkey named Abu.
He discovers a magical object in the Cave of Wonders.
He pretends to be Prince Ali Ababwa.
He falls in love with the Princess of Agrabah.
He asks a powerful being for three wishes.
He gives his last wish to set a friend free.
He is often chased by palace guards for stealing food.
He flies on a Magic Carpet.
One jump ahead of the breadline.
He defeats an evil sorcerer who turns into a giant snake.
He lives in a dilapidated tower with a view of the palace.
Scott Weinger provided his speaking voice.
He is an orphan who dreams of a better life.
He tricks a genie into getting him out of a cave without using a wish.
His father is the King of Thieves.
He wears a small purple vest and white pants.
He promises to show the princess 'a whole new world'.
He is called a 'street rat' by others.
He saves the Sultan from being hypnotized.
She follows a White Rabbit down a hole.
She attends a very unbirthday tea party.
She changes size by eating cakes and drinking potions.
She meets a cat with a disappearing body and a wide grin.
She plays croquet with a flamingo and a hedgehog.
She is put on trial by the Queen of Hearts.
She wears a blue dress and a white apron.
She has a pet cat named Dinah.
She gets lost in the Tulgey Wood.
She is bored by her sister's history lesson.
She meets a caterpillar smoking a hookah.
She is voiced by Kathryn Beaumont.
She almost drowns in a sea of her own tears.
She paints the roses red to save the gardeners.
She is a young British girl with blonde hair.
She wakes up to realize it was all a dream.
She recites 'How Doth the Little Busy Bee' incorrectly.
She is judged for her lack of height by flowers.
She is a character from Lady and the Tramp II: Scamp's Adventure.
She is a Pomeranian/Siberian Husky mix.
She was once a house dog but became a stray.
She sings 'I Didn't Know That I Could Feel This Way'.
She helps Scamp realize the value of a family.
She has cream-colored fur and floppy ears.
She is voiced by Alyssa Milano.
She rescues Scamp from the pound.
She is often seen in a junkyard.
She has had five different families.
She fights Buster to protect Scamp.
She is adopted by the Dear family at the end.
She wants to belong to a family more than anything.
She meets Scamp while he is running away from home.
She has a small notch in her left ear.
She warns Scamp about the dangers of the streets.
She is a sequel character to a 1955 classic.
He is the drummer for Dr. Teeth and the Electric Mayhem.
He has wild pink/red hair and orange skin.
He has to be chained to his drum kit sometimes.
He is performed by Frank Oz originally.
He communicates mostly in grunts and shouts.
He was inspired by Keith Moon of The Who.
He appears in The Muppet Show.
He has bushy eyebrows and no visible nose.
He plays in a band with Floyd Pepper and Janice.
He tries to eat a bunny in a Muppet movie.
He grows to giant size in 'Muppets from Space'.
He finds a hobby in bunny-sitting.
He wears a torn peasant shirt and rope belt.
He is pure id and energy.
She is the Princess of Arendelle.
She wants to build a snowman.
She falls in love with an ice harvester.
She has a white streak in her hair.
She gets engaged to a prince she just met.
She saves her sister from being killed by Hans.
She sings 'For the First Time in Forever'.
She is voiced by Kristen Bell.
She punches a prince in the face.
She travels to the North Mountain.
She buys winter gear from Oaken's Trading Post.
She becomes Queen of Arendelle in the sequel.
She destroys a dam to free the forest.
She has a talking snowman friend.
She trades her voice for legs.
She has a fish friend named Flounder.
She combs her hair with a 'dinglehopper'.
She wants to be 'part of your world'.
She saves Prince Eric from drowning.
She signs a contract with a sea witch.
She wears a purple seashell bikini top.
She is 16 years old in the first film.
She is voiced by Jodi Benson.
She has a daughter named Melody.
She is the first Disney Princess to become a mother.
She mistakes a pipe for a musical instrument.
She hides her collection in a secret grotto.
She turns into sea foam in the original fairy tale.
She is supervised by a crab named Sebastian.
She is also known as Sleeping Beauty.
She pricks her finger on a spinning wheel.
She is raised by three fairies in the woods.
She goes by the name Briar Rose.
She meets Prince Phillip in the forest.
She sleeps for a long time.
Her dress changes from pink to blue.
She has golden hair and violet eyes.
She is awakened by true love's kiss.
She is the daughter of King Stefan.
She only has 18 lines of dialogue in her movie.
She dances with an owl wearing a cape.
She is betrothed to Phillip at birth.
She is the third official Disney Princess.
She is gifted the gift of song.
She is gifted the gift of beauty.
She walks barefoot in the forest.
She doesn't know she is a princess until her 16th birthday.
His mother is shot by a hunter.
His best friends are Thumper and Flower.
He learns to walk on ice.
He is the Young Prince of the Forest.
He falls in love with Faline.
He fights another buck named Ronno.
He becomes the Great Prince of the Forest.
He has white spots on his back as a fawn.
His father is the Great Prince.
He eats the blossoms but not the greens.
He is based on a book by Felix Salten.
He meets a mole who hates the sun.
He is very shy as a child.
He has twin fawns at the end.
He learns that 'Man' is in the forest.
He is a personal healthcare companion.
He looks like a giant marshmallow.
He was created by Tadashi Hamada.
He runs out of battery and acts drunk.
He cannot hurt a human being.
He asks 'On a scale of 1 to 10, how would you rate your pain?'.
He sacrifices himself in a portal.
He has a carbon fiber skeleton in his armor.
He calls a cat a 'hairy baby'.
He is voiced by Scott Adsit.
He hugs people to warm them up.
He is based on a Marvel comic character.
He leaves his healthcare chip behind.
He lives in an enchanted castle.
He must learn to love before the last petal falls.
He falls in love with Belle.
He fights a pack of wolves.
His real name is never mentioned in the movie.
He learns to use a spoon.
He releases Belle to save her father.
He transforms back into a human.
He wears a blue suit for the dance.
He was cursed by an Enchantress.
He is 21 years old when the curse ends.
He is voiced by Robby Benson.
He has the head of a buffalo and body of a bear.
She trades places with her father in a dungeon.
She falls in love with a Beast.
She wants 'adventure in the great wide somewhere'.
She nurses the Beast back to health.
She is the daughter of an inventor.
She sees her father in a magic mirror.
She wears a blue dress with a white apron.
She is considered 'odd' by the villagers.
She teaches the Beast to read (in some versions).
She finds a rose in the West Wing.
She is voiced by Paige O'Hara.
She has brown hair and hazel eyes.
She is the first commoner to become a Disney Princess by marriage.
She rides a horse named Philippe.
She breaks the spell with her love.
He is the son of Belle and the Beast.
He invites the villain kids to prep school.
He dates Mal, the daughter of Maleficent.
He is spelled by a love potion cookie.
He is played by Mitchell Hope.
He wears a blue suit with a yellow crest.
He tries to learn how to be 'bad'.
He turns into a beast briefly.
He is very kind and forgiving.
He believes everyone deserves a second chance.
He is a character in the Descendants franchise.
He wears a blue collar with a lightning bolt.
He goes on missions around the world.
He has a robot dog sister named A.R.F.
He is from the show Puppy Dog Pals.
He has a cat sister named Hissy.
He is the leader of the duo.
He has a neighbor dog named Keia.
He travels in a carrier invented by Bob.
He is voiced by Issac Ryan Brown.
He helps Bob with his inventions.
He is very protective of Rolly.
He has a hook for a hand.
He is afraid of a crocodile.
His ship is called the Jolly Roger.
His first mate is Mr. Smee.
He wears a large red coat and feathered hat.
He wants to find the Lost Boys' hideout.
He kidnaps Wendy and the boys.
He tries to poison Peter Pan.
He lost his hand to a crocodile.
He is voiced by Hans Conried.
He shoots a pirate for singing.
He promises not to lay a finger (or hook) on Peter.
He is chased away by the crocodile at the end.
He is an elegant but cowardly villain.
He is played by Johnny Depp.
He has a compass that points to what he wants most.
He is always escaping from the British Navy.
He owes a debt to Davy Jones.
He is stranded on an island with sea turtles.
He has a 'P' branded on his arm.
He is one of the nine Pirate Lords.
He is eaten by the Kraken.
He has a father named Teague.
He searches for the Fountain of Youth.
He calls himself 'Captain' at every opportunity.
He escapes from a Turkish prison.
He is the worst pirate you've ever heard of.
He has a wooden sword given by Peter Pan.
He leads a crew of Never Land pirates.
He has a parrot named Skully.
He becomes a Captain later in the series.
He has friends named Izzy and Cubby.
He saves Never Land from darkness.
He wears a blue coat with gold trim.
He meets the real Peter Pan.
He has a special sword named Destiny.
He becomes the guardian of Never Land.
He has black hair and brown eyes.
He is brave and a good leader.
He is a Disney Junior character.
He is a pink and purple striped cat.
He has a very wide grin.
He leads Alice to the Mad Hatter.
He causes trouble for the Queen of Hearts.
He is voiced by Sterling Holloway.
He appears in the Tulgey Wood.
He fades away leaving only his smile.
He is not afraid of the Queen.
He is a guide, but a confusing one.
He has a chip in his rim.
He helps free Belle and Maurice.
He uses Maurice's invention to break down a door.
He asks 'Mama, are they gonna live happily ever after?'.
He turns back into a boy at the end.
He blows bubbles in his tea.
He stows away in Belle's bag.
He is voiced by Bradley Pierce.
He has many brothers and sisters.
He is a servant in the Beast's castle.
He has a gold handle for a nose.
He doesn't understand what's happening between Belle and Beast.
He is transformed by the Enchantress.
He is the youngest main character in the castle.
One has a red nose, the other black.
One wears a fedora and jacket.
They have a friend named Gadget.
One has two teeth together, the other separated.
They try to steal Pluto's bone.
They are named after a famous furniture maker.
They have a reboot movie on Disney+.
She rides in a pumpkin carriage.
She must be home by midnight.
She sings 'A Dream Is a Wish Your Heart Makes'.
She wears a blue ballgown (originally silver).
She works as a scullery maid.
Her mice friends make her a pink dress.
She is voiced by Ilene Woods.
She has a dog named Bruno.
She is kind to everyone, even her enemies.
She loses her father at a young age.
She is the second Disney Princess.
She cleans the floor with bubbles.
She proves that the shoe fits.
He is the head of the household.
He is Lumiere's rival and friend.
He is very strict about rules.
He gives a tour of the castle.
He is afraid of the Beast's temper.
He has a pendulum inside him.
He is voiced by David Ogden Stiers.
He tries to stop the dinner for Belle.
He is transformed back into a human.
He gets buried in a pie during the battle.
He says 'If it's not Baroque, don't fix it'.
He winds himself up when nervous.
He has a mustache as a clock.
He tries to compose a romantic atmosphere.
He argues about where to put the Beast's gift.
She wants to make a coat out of puppies.
She has half black and half white hair.
She smokes a long cigarette holder.
She is an old school friend of Anita.
She chases the puppies in a snowy car chase.
She has a very bony figure.
She is one of the most iconic Disney villains.
She has a live-action movie about her origin.
She wears a massive white fur coat.
She gets covered in molasses and mud.
She hates anything that isn't fashionable.
She offers to buy the puppies.
She has a very loud, cackling laugh.
She wears a large bow on her head.
She is Minnie Mouse's best friend.
She is often sassy and sophisticated.
She wears purple or pink usually.
She has three nieces named April, May, and June.
She first appeared in 'Mr. Duck Steps Out'.
She works as a reporter in some cartoons.
She is part of the Sensational Six.
She has a temper like Donald, but controls it better.
She is voiced by Tress MacNeille.
She has a ponytail made of feathers.
She is a member of the Mickey Mouse Clubhouse.
She is sometimes a damsel in distress.
She is very loyal to her friends.
She has a dragon friend named Stuffy.
She has a lamb friend named Lambie.
She has a Big Book of Boo Boos.
She wants to be a doctor like her mom.
She has a younger brother named Donny.
She wears a white lab coat.
She has a snowman friend named Chilly.
She has a hippo nurse named Hallie.
She operates a clinic in her backyard playhouse.
She is a Disney Junior character.
He has a very short temper.
He has a unique, raspy voice.
He has three nephews: Huey, Dewey, and Louie.
He is Mickey Mouse's best friend.
He often says 'Oh boy, oh boy, oh boy!'.
He gets angry when things don't go his way.
He is a member of the Three Caballeros.
He has a girlfriend named Daisy.
He serves in the Navy in some cartoons.
He is the Royal Magician in Kingdom Hearts.
He is often the victim of chipmunk pranks.
He has a lucky number 313 (his license plate).
He gets red in the face when mad.
He tries to be a good uncle.
He has appeared in more films than any other Disney character.
He is the youngest of the Seven Dwarfs.
He wears a purple hat and green tunic.
His clothes are too big for him.
He is often the butt of Doc's jokes.
He dances with Snow White on his shoulders.
He finds diamonds in the mine.
He tries to get a second kiss from Snow White.
He plays the drums during the party.
He swallows a bar of soap.
He is the only dwarf without a beard.
He is very clumsy but lovable.
He puts diamonds in his eyes.
He is the last one to leave the mine.
He is scared of the Queen disguised as a hag.
His real name is Jumbo Jr.
He is teased by other elephants.
His best friend is Timothy Q. Mouse.
He sees pink elephants on parade.
He wakes up in a tree.
He is made into a clown.
He visits his mother in solitary confinement.
He is delivered by a stork.
He sprays the ringmaster with peanuts.
He is the only title character who doesn't speak.
His tail is attached with a nail.
He lives in the Hundred Acre Wood.
He lives in a stick house that falls down.
He is friends with Pooh and Piglet.
He is voiced by Peter Cullen (Optimus Prime).
He receives a burst red balloon as a gift.
He receives an empty honey pot as a gift.
He has a pink bow on his tail sometimes.
He says 'Oh, bother' rarely, usually Pooh says it.
He finds a new tail which is actually Owl's bell pull.
She is the Crown Princess of Avalor.
She was trapped in an amulet for 41 years.
She has a scepter of light.
She has a sister named Isabel.
She rides a jaquin named Skylar.
She is the first Latina Disney Princess.
She is voiced by Aimee Carrero.
She has a spirit guide named Zuzo.
She becomes Queen at the end of her series.
She celebrates Dia de los Muertos.
She has a wizard friend named Mateo.
She wears a flower in her hair.
She was saved by Sofia the First.
She rules over a kingdom inspired by Latin culture.
She has a sister named Anna.
She creates a snow monster named Marshmallow.
She wears a blue ice dress.
She hears a mysterious voice calling her.
She rides a water horse named the Nokk.
She is voiced by Idina Menzel.
She isolates herself to protect others.
She catches a cold and makes snowgies.
She abdicates the throne to her sister.
The cold never bothered her anyway.
She was born with her powers.
She wears gloves to conceal her magic.
She is the daughter of the Evil Queen.
She is best friends with Mal.
She is a character in Descendants.
She is played by Sofia Carson.
She lives on the Isle of the Lost.
She is obsessed with beauty initially.
She helps Ben with his kingly duties.
She wants a castle of her own.
She uses chemistry to make makeup.
She is known for her blue leather jacket.
She learns that being fair is more important than being fairest.
She starts a fashion brand called Evie's 4 Hearts.
She asks 'Mirror, mirror on the wall'.
She wants to be the fairest of them all.
She transforms into an old hag.
She orders a huntsman to kill Snow White.
She wants Snow White's heart in a box.
She wears a crown and a high collar.
She is the first Disney villain.
She is jealous of her stepdaughter.
She creates a sleeping death potion.
She is crushed by a boulder (implied).
They are Flora, Fauna, and Merryweather.
They raise Aurora in the forest.
They argue over the color of the dress (pink vs blue).
They give gifts to the baby princess.
They shrink down to small size.
They put the kingdom to sleep.
They turn the arrows into flowers.
They enchant the sword of truth.
One wears red, one green, one blue.
They pretend to be peasant aunts.
They give the gift of beauty and song.
He is a small purple dragon.
He is the mascot of the Imagination pavilion.
He has orange wings and horns.
He turns a house upside down.
He is a figment of your imagination.
He appears in Inside Out as an easter egg.
He has a popcorn bucket that people wait hours for.
He has a comic book series.
He has two tiny claws on his hands.
He is friends with Nick Wilde.
He drives a sports car very fast.
His full name is Flash Slothmore.
He helps Judy Hopps run a license plate.
He wears a green shirt and tie.
He has a mug that says 'You want it when?'.
He tells a joke to his coworker Priscilla.
He is the 'fastest' sloth at the DMV.
He is pulled over for speeding.
He is voiced by Raymond S. Persi.
He takes a long time to stamp a paper.
He is a yellow and blue fish.
He is not actually a flounder, but a tropical fish.
He helps Ariel collect human things.
He gets chased by a shark.
He pulls Ariel to the surface.
He is voiced by Jason Marin.
He tries to tell Ariel about the statue.
He is called a 'guppy' by Ariel.
He helps Ariel swim to the wedding ship.
He is afraid of the dark.
He whispers to Ariel during the concert.
He appears in the TV series as well.
He is named after a flower.
He falls in love with a female skunk named Bluebelle.
He has a white stripe down his back.
He says 'That's not a flower! He's a little fella!'.
He has a son named Bambi (wait, no, that's the deer).
He is found in a bed of flowers.
He doesn't like being called a skunk.
He is one of the three main friends in the movie.
His real name is Eugene Fitzherbert.
He falls in love with Rapunzel.
He gets hit with a frying pan.
He dies and comes back to life.
He is voiced by Zachary Levi.
He reads 'The Tales of Flynnigan Rider'.
He complains about his nose on wanted posters.
He guides Rapunzel to the lanterns.
He is betrayed by the Stabbington brothers.
He says 'You were my new dream'.
He eventually becomes Captain of the Guard.
He wears a pork pie hat and polka dot tie.
He is often heckled by Statler and Waldorf.
He was originally performed by Frank Oz.
He is insecure about his comedy.
He has a mother named Ma Bear.
He gets tomatoes thrown at him.
He tries to be a ventriloquist.
He has a cousin named Fozzie.
He appears in The Muppet Show.
He wears a fake nose sometimes.
He is roughly the size of a barge.
He uses antlers in all of his decorating.
He is the villain of Beauty and the Beast.
He has a sidekick named LeFou.
He is very vain and arrogant.
He tries to kill the Beast.
He falls from the castle tower.
He thinks reading is for women.
He sings a song about himself.
He is voiced by Richard White.
He arranges a wedding without asking the bride.
He was voiced by Robin Williams.
He has an itty bitty living space.
He turns Aladdin into a prince.
He cannot make people fall in love.
He cannot bring people back from the dead.
He goes on a vacation at the end.
He plays chess with the Magic Carpet.
He has a son named Max.
He wears a tall green hat.
He does the 'Goofy Holler' when falling.
He tries to cast the Perfect Cast.
He was originally called Dippy Dawg.
He is Captain of the Royal Knights in Kingdom Hearts.
He goes to college in the sequel.
He thinks his son is embarrassed by him.
He is voiced by Bill Farmer.
He is one of the Seven Dwarfs.
He is always angry or annoyed.
He crosses his arms a lot.
He warns the others about women.
He secretly cares about Snow White.
He wears a brown tunic and red hat.
He leads the charge to save Snow White.
He gets kissed on the head by Snow White.
He sleeps in a bed with his name on it.
He is voiced by Pinto Colvig.
He is the most capable dwarf after Doc.
He wears a yellow shirt and green hat.
He is best friends with Jaq.
He gets trapped in a teacup.
He turns into a white horse.
He tries to carry too much food.
He gets a key from the stepmother's pocket.
He is rescued from a mousetrap.
She is from Puppy Dog Pals.
She is Bingo and Rolly's sister.
She helps the pugs on missions sometimes.
She is the only cat in the main cast.
She is voiced by Jessica DiCicco.
She is cleaner than the dogs.
She has a favorite toy mouse.
She travels in the carrier too.
She is often the voice of reason.
She gets annoyed by the puppies' energy.
She can be affectionate when she wants to.
She has stripes on her tail.
She is part of Bob's family.
He has a ghost dog named Zero.
He is a skeleton in a pinstripe suit.
He falls in love with Sally.
He is voiced by Chris Sarandon (speaking) and Danny Elfman (singing).
He takes off his own head.
He is bored with the same old thing.
He delivers shrunken heads as gifts.
He is shot down by the military.
He realizes he belongs in Halloween Town.
He is the master of fright.
He wears an orange jacket and red hat.
He is the leader of the mice.
He finds the beads for the dress.
He rescues Gus from the trap.
He steals the key from Lady Tremaine.
He is voiced by Jimmy MacDonald.
He warns Cinderella about the time.
She is the Princess of Agrabah.
She has a pet tiger named Rajah.
She runs away from the palace.
She refuses to marry a suitor she doesn't love.
She flies on a Magic Carpet.
She falls in love with a 'street rat'.
She is trapped in an hourglass.
She kisses Jafar to distract him.
She says 'I am not a prize to be won!'.
She is voiced by Linda Larkin.
She disguises herself as a peasant.
She gives an apple to a hungry child.
She is the daughter of the Sultan.
She is the sixth Disney Princess.
She wants to see the world.
She recognizes Aladdin by his eyes.
He sings 'When You Wish Upon a Star'.
He wears a top hat and carries an umbrella.
He is appointed by the Blue Fairy.
He tries to stop Pinocchio from going to Pleasure Island.
He receives a gold badge at the end.
He says 'Always let your conscience be your guide'.
He is swallowed by Monstro the whale.
He is the narrator of the story.
He is voiced by Cliff Edwards.
He has a very polite demeanor.
He appears in Kingdom Hearts as the chronicler.
He is almost crushed by a mallet.
He teaches Pinocchio right from wrong.
He is a 'Lord High Keeper of the Knowledge of Right and Wrong'.
She is a rabbit police officer.
She is the first bunny cop in Zootopia.
She partners with a fox named Nick Wilde.
She solves the case of the missing mammals.
She has a carrot pen recorder.
She wears a blue police uniform.
She is voiced by Ginnifer Goodwin.
She causes a panic at a press conference.
She resigns from the force briefly.
She drives a tiny meter maid cart.
She apologizes to Nick under a bridge.
He is the leader of the Muppets.
He has an on-and-off relationship with Miss Piggy.
He says 'Hi-ho, Kermit the Frog here'.
He has a nephew named Robin.
He was created by Jim Henson.
He has a collar of jagged points.
He is often the straight man to the chaos.
He has a star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame.
He flails his arms when excited.
He has an evil look-alike named Constantine.
He says 'It's not easy being green'.
He tries to keep the show running.
His best friend is a reindeer named Sven.
He sings 'Reindeers Are Better Than People'.
He falls in love with Anna.
He is voiced by Jonathan Groff.
He tries to propose to Anna many times.
He sings an 80s style ballad 'Lost in the Woods'.
He becomes the Official Ice Master and Deliverer.
He saves Anna from the snowstorm.
He is a bit socially awkward.
He wears a thick fur-lined coat.
He asks if Anna knows the Prince's foot size.
She wears a pink tutu and bow.
She is Doc McStuffins' best friend.
She often says 'I need a cuddle!'.
She is very sweet and sensitive.
She helps Doc in the clinic.
She is voiced by Lara Jill Miller.
She has a crush on Stuffy (sometimes implied).
She gets jam on her fur.
She is one of the main toys.
She dreams of going to McStuffinsville.
She is a Disney Junior character.
She is a young Hawaiian girl.
She has a doll named Scrump.
She lives with her sister Nani.
She feeds Pudge the fish a peanut butter sandwich.
She is considered 'weird' by other kids.
She wears a red dress with white leaves.
She tries to turn Stitch into a model citizen.
She is voiced by Daveigh Chase.
She saves Stitch from being taken away.
He is a servant in the Beast's castle.
He dates a feather duster named Babette (or Fifi).
He lights the way for Maurice.
He is Cogsworth's rival and friend.
He organizes the dinner for Belle.
He is voiced by Jerry Orbach.
He fights the mob with fire.
He is transformed back into a human.
He is rebellious against the Master's orders.
He gives advice to the Beast on love.
He wears a large hat with a price tag.
He is friends with the March Hare.
He asks 'Why is a raven like a writing desk?'.
He tries to fix a watch with butter.
He is voiced by Ed Wynn.
He pours tea into half a cup.
He is afraid of the Queen of Hearts.
He has a dormouse in a teapot.
He moves down the table to clean cups.
He calls Alice 'Mary Ann' (wait, no that's the Rabbit).
She is the daughter of Maleficent.
She can turn into a dragon.
She is from the Isle of the Lost.
She is played by Dove Cameron.
She becomes the Lady of the Court.
She returns to the Isle to get her mojo back.
She has a father named Hades.
She casts a love spell on Ben.
She realizes she doesn't need to be perfect.
She is a natural born leader.
She is the Mistress of All Evil.
She has a pet raven named Diablo.
She wasn't invited to the christening.
She lives in the Forbidden Mountain.
She wears a black horned headdress.
She commands an army of goons.
She is defeated by the Sword of Truth.
She is voiced by Eleanor Audley.
She casts a forest of thorns.
She has a staff with a glowing green orb.
She is the main antagonist of Sleeping Beauty.
She appears in Kingdom Hearts as a major villain.
She has a daughter named Mal (in Descendants).
She says 'Now shall you deal with me!'.
She is one of the most powerful Disney villains.
She says 'Ladies do not start fights, but they can finish them'.
She has two brothers, Berlioz and Toulouse.
She wants to be a lady.
She is kidnapped by Edgar the butler.
She is transported in a milk truck.
She is returned home by the alley cats.
She is often seen on merchandise.
He stole the heart of Te Fiti.
He is voiced by Dwayne Johnson.
He was abandoned by his parents.
